item.description:

item.description:
Source: Six Senses Hotel Resorts Spas’ Chinese website. To expand its online footprint, Six Senses Hotels Resorts Spas has launched a website in Chinese. The new website offers the same content and features as the brand’s English website. This move is anticipated to attract more customers from China, a key growth market for Six Senses.
